scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:types
scripts.local:test: npm run db:up && npm run test:mssql17 && npm run test:mssql19 && npm run test:mssql22 && npm run db:down
scripts.local:coverage: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up --build -d mssql22 && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up waitmssql22 && npm run test:mssql22:coverage && npm run db:down
scripts.test:mssql17: npm run lint && cross-env DB=mssql17 TZ='Africa/Algiers' jest --runInBand --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:mssql19: npm run lint && cross-env DB=mssql19 TZ='Africa/Algiers' jest --runInBand --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:mssql22: npm run lint && cross-env DB=mssql22 TZ='Africa/Algiers' jest --runInBand --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:mssql22:coverage: npm run lint && cross-env DB=mssql22 TZ='Africa/Algiers' jest --runInBand --config test/jest.config.js --coverage
scripts.db:up: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up --build -d mssql17 mssql19 mssql22 && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up waitmssql17 waitmssql19 waitmssql22
